attributes.action: Make Public Sexual Harassment A Criminal Offence:
attributes.additional_details: The government is here to ensure that the citizens of the United Kingdom are safe. And to ensure this safety we need for Public Sexual Harassment to be a Criminal Offence. People are made to feel uncomfortable, objectified and afraid on the streets, and with this being a criminal offence, I believe that the public will be safe from predators.
attributes.background: People are endangered and make uncomfortable on our streets of the United Kingdom, due to verbal sexual harassment. This is dubbed as “cat-calling” with the government’s help and your signing of this petition. We can make our streets safer and keep eachother safe from Public Sexual Harassment.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578940
